root.message: The REG_AGG field for indicator 3-2-2, translated into en
root.data: Global and regional estimates of neonatal mortality rates are derived using the aggregated number of country-specific neonatal deaths for a specific region or globally estimated by the United Nations Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (UN IGME) using a birth-week cohort approach and aggregated country-specific births from the United Nations Population Division.
